name: I Got Reincarnated To Another World And All I Can Do Is Block Attacks
name_original: I Got Reincarnated To Another World And All I Can Do Is Block Attacks
description:
Meet Tama, your normal average high school boy, who's dead and being reincarnated to another world by Goddess Lilu! And on top of that, he was given the Goddess' Blessings! One of the cheat abilities you've found on the fantasy light novel or manga that you read, huh? Isn't that just cool and stuffs?

But here's the thing...

Tama's curse blessing gave him a sturdy body that can withstand and return any kind of attack, as long as he is on defending state. But as a compensation, he CANNOT attack any monster with any kind of weapon, at all. Not only that, the curse blessing prevent him for escaping from the monster by jumping or sliding through it. All Tama can do is block the attack of the monster by defending. 

And to add to his unfortunate events, he is being teleported to the forest, far from the town. Now, he has to find his way out of the forest, battling with defending from the many kind of monster he found.

Rules:

Find your way out of the forest! Move using Right or Left Arrow Key or Jump using Up Arrow Key. Withstand and return any kind of attacks by defending using SPACE Key. Get potions for your health point, and beware of the traps! If you runs out of lives it will be game over for you, so be careful!
